productSubmission.title: Add Your Product to Our Store
productSubmission.description: Do you have a product you want to showcase in our store? Contact us via WhatsApp at 01024911062 to add your product

wholesaleSubmission.title: Add Your Products as a Wholesaler
wholesaleSubmission.description: We are looking for wholesalers to supply us with high-quality products at competitive prices. If you are a wholesaler and interested in collaborating with us, contact us via WhatsApp at 01024911062

careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.description: We are always looking for talented individuals to grow with us. Explore our currently available positions below.
careers.growthDescription: We invest in our employees' development through training programs and clear career progression paths.
careers.benefitsDescription: We offer competitive salaries, health insurance, paid leave, and employee discounts.
careers.inclusionDescription: We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
careers.workLifeDescription: We respect our employees' time and strive to maintain a healthy work-life balance.

delivery.title: Delivery Driver
delivery.description: We are looking for an active and reliable delivery driver to join our team. The ideal candidate should have their own transportation (tuk-tuk, motorcycle, or car) and good driving skills.

designer.title: Digital Designer
designer.description: We are looking for a talented digital designer with a high artistic sense to join our team. The ideal candidate should have experience in various design software.

socialMedia.title: Social Media Marketing Manager
socialMedia.description: We are looking for a talented digital marketing manager to join our team. The ideal candidate should have experience in managing social media accounts and creating engaging content.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We help emerging merchants easily deliver their products to customers. That's why we don't charge any fees for adding products, but we do require reasonable prices to ensure everyone can afford to shop.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We want to be the place that brings together emerging merchants and buyers. We sell products at wholesale and competitive prices so everyone benefits. We believe that when we cooperate together, God will provide for us all.

support.title: Supporting Emerging Merchants
support.description: We provide opportunities for emerging merchants to reach customers without any additional fees

affordable.title: Affordable Prices
affordable.description: We ensure prices are suitable for everyone to make shopping easier

community.title: Cooperative Community
community.description: We encourage cooperation between merchants and buyers to create a successful and thriving community
